review: Works great! Beautiful picture very, very clear within the apps and movies we view. Great deal for what you get. Definitely recommending to everyone
author: TSKPP

review: The best streaming device on the market. Period.
author: Ahkeem R. Smith

review: I'm a Google power user who owns a Chromecast, I've got a media center PC with Plex, windows media center, and xbmc, and the fire stick is my favorite interface to my media.  If you're an amazon prime member this is a no brained.  Add the Plex app to stream media from a PC or NAS and this is awesome.  I also recommend the PBS app.
author: James

review: Got one when Amazon first announced it for $15 and another free/included with a 3 month subscription ($60) to SlingTV. There's not much to say besides I love them. The interface is easy to use and the remote and app are great!
author: Gigabyte

review: was fine most oof time liked it

review: fast, easy set up, smooth streaming
